a.n: The Amazing World of Gumball IV

p.k: The Routine / The Parking / The Upgrade Mom and the kids depart for their hard day's work leaving a seemingly lazy Dad half-asleep on the sofa. Mom has given him one very simple job: buy mayonnaise. / The Watterson family's search for a parking space at the mall takes a little longer than expected. / Gumball and Darwin persuade Bobert to upgrade his operating system, then start to wish they hadn't.
